title: Bride Of Ignat
alternative_title: Bride of Ignat; Igunaato no Hanayome; イグナートの花嫁;
status: Bride of Ignat; Igunaato no Hanayome; イグナートの花嫁;
description:
Description :
        Divinity x SacrificeA nonhuman marriage that mends a frozen heart."No matter where you are, if your life is meaningless..."Rita is a lonely boy who was chosen to be the dragon's bride according to village tradition.The existence of snowy mountain dragons, which has been passed down since ancient times, is now nothing more than a legend.  However, Rita cannot find a role in the village.  He accepts being sacrificed, even though he realizes it's a lie.The one who saved Rita, who was wandering through a blizzard looking for the dragon and about to die, was Ignat, a beautiful dragon in human form.Rita's eyes sparkle as she realizes that she was able to fulfill her role as a bride because of the presence of the dragon.  However, Ignat declares, ``I don't need a bride.''  Still unable to give up, Rita learns the secret of the ritual that transforms humans into dragons.Silent dragon x fearless sacrificeA fantasy BL about a non-human marriage that will soothe your frozen heart!
